title: Looking for People to join a serious Ranked team
body:
Looking to start a brand new Ranked team if your serious about playing league and want to ascend as many ranks as we can then id like to hear from you, 

I don't care about your rank but you must perform best as you can,

If you are a person that wants to be a negative communication (raging, flaming, blaming others) your not welcome,

All spot are available but I will be on holidays til 18 of January so plenty of time to comment me.

Plus if you really want to be on this team prefer to be on as much as possible and at least have some way of voice communication.

So that is all the basics if you are interested please let me know by commenting or adding me until then see ya's after my holiday

IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Role:
Communication:
Serious player:

IGN:daftpinky
Age:19
Rank:plat5

Communication: ts, curse
Serious player: umm dugh

hit me up ingame.
